title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller: mordant for purple
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 243 x 72.5 cm (7 ft. 11 11/16 in. x 28 9/16 in.)
description: Straight repeat of three offset scenes framed by am ivy vine fulling full width of fabric. Each scene illustrates children in a field. Length of repeat: 42cm. (16 1/2"). Fabric does not seem to be wide enough for the pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1840.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller: mordant for purple. Gift of L'Antiquaire, Inc.. 1976-30-5-a.
